name: Finding Rin
description:
A child has gone missing, and an intrepid detective (that's you!) has been brought on to find him. But there's a catch - the child is from a secret world of monsters. If anyone finds out, it'll be a disaster.

"Finding Rin" was created for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story game jam. It was created in Ren'py.

Credits:
